code: @Override public void configure() throws Exception {     // bridge item1 to item2     final String item1 = NodeIds.nodeValue("urn:org:apache:camel", "items-MyItem").     final String item2 = NodeIds.nodeValue("urn:org:apache:camel", "items-MyItem2").     from("milo-client:tcp://foo:bar@localhost:12685?node=" + item1).log("From OPC UA: ${body}").to("milo-client:tcp://foo:bar@localhost:12685?node" + item2). }

public static void main(final String[] args) throws Exception {     // camel conext     final CamelContext context = new DefaultCamelContext().     // add routes     context.addRoutes(new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             // bridge item1 to item2             final String item1 = NodeIds.nodeValue("urn:org:apache:camel", "items-MyItem").             final String item2 = NodeIds.nodeValue("urn:org:apache:camel", "items-MyItem2").             from("milo-client:tcp://foo:bar@localhost:12685?node=" + item1).log("From OPC UA: ${body}").to("milo-client:tcp://foo:bar@localhost:12685?node" + item2).         }     }).     // start     context.start().     while (true) {         Thread.sleep(Long.MAX_VALUE).     } }
